adsouza.shapes

Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • adsouza.shapes.Shape
      • adsouza.shapes.Shape2D
        • adsouza.shapes.RegularPolygon

  • public class RegularPolygon
extends Shape2D
    This class represents a simple Polygon Shape. It can create a representation of any Regular Polygon shape and perform various trigonometric calculations regarding a polygon shape.
    Version:
    10/26/2018
    Author:
    D'Souza

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegularPolygon()
      Creates a default RegularPolygon object with all dimensions and properties set to zero.
      RegularPolygon(double x, double y, int numSides, double sideLength)
      Creates a custom, RegularPolygon object with the specified number of sides and side length

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calcArea()
      Calculates and returns the area value of this RegularPolygon object
      double calcPerimeter()
      Calculates and returns the perimeter value of this RegularPolygon object
      void calcr()
      Calculates the Radius of the inscribed Circle of this RegularPolygon object
      void calcR()
      Calculates the Radius of the circumscribed Circle of this RegularPolygon object
      double calcVertexAngle()
      Calculates and returns the vertex angle value of this RegularPolygon object
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      Draws a new instance of the RegularPolygon object using Processing's PApplet
      void drawBoundingCircles(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      Draws a Circle that bounds this RegularPolygon object at its edges using Processing's PApplet
      int getNumSides()
      Calculates and returns the number of sides in this RegularPolygon object
      double getSideLength()
      Calculates and returns the side lengths in this RegularPolygon object
      boolean isPointInside(double x, double y)
      Checks whether the point (x,y) is inside the rectangle circumscribed in this polygon's circumscribed circle

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Checks whether the point (x,y) is inside the rectangle circumscribed in this polygon's circumscribed circle
        Specified by:
        isPointInside in class Shape
        Parameters:
        x - is the x-coordinate of the point to check for inclusion
        y - is the y-coordinate of the point to check for inclusion
        Returns:
        true is the point is inside this circumscribed rectangle or false otherwise
